name: Every 10 seconds color will be changed
name_original: Every 10 seconds color will be changed
description: Game like Doodle Jump. The character always jump. Use "A" and "D" keys for turn left and right. If mobile - use tap to left screen side and right screen side. Every 10 seconds color (background, character, platforms, UI) will be changed. Be carful, the character can only jump on platforms of the same color as him.
